*****************Security Questions***************** Security Questions
Select security questions and answers These question will be used to verify your identity and help recover your password in case you forget it Question 1 Question 2 Select your question Enter your question Enter your answer Other
*****************Police Verification***************** Police Verification Do you have Police Verification? Do you have reference Buddy id? Yes No Upload Police Verification proof Verification Proof No file selected Enter Reference Buddy id Submit police verification or reference Buddy-ID later to get more tasks
